John
Aspinall

- UX Designer -

Hi I'm John a UX designer experienced in working in Agile teams for large organisations. I work for clients around Manchester but can also travel for projects and work remotely.

I'm also a web and UI designer with strong front end design and development skills. A selection of my work can be viewed in myt portfolio.

Portfolio
